{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|こ|ろ}}

===Etymology===
From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=ころ|葫蘆|tr={{IPAchar|/huo luo/}}|lit=gourd + rushes, reeds}}.  Compare modern {{etyl|nan|-}} reading ''hô͘-lô͘''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|ころ}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{ja-l|葫盧}}, {{ja-l|胡盧}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ころ}}

# [[bottle]] [[gourd]], [[calabash]]

====Usage notes====
This term ''koro'' appears to be quite rare.  The term {{m|ja|瓢箪|tr=hyōtan}} is used more commonly to mean {{m|en|gourd}} or {{m|en|calabash}}.
